title: Merge Two Sorted Linked Lists
statement: Given two sorted linked lists, merge them into one sorted list by splicing together the nodes of the first two lists.
input_format:
First line contains N1 and N2.
Second line contains N1 space-separated integers (first sorted list).
Third line contains N2 space-separated integers (second sorted list).
output_format: Print the merged sorted list as space-separated integers.
constraints:
0 <= N1, N2 <= 50
-100 <= Node.val <= 100
Both lists are sorted in non-decreasing order.
